item.title: Schecter C-7 Apocalypse
item.description: In early March of 2020 after months of searching and hunting, right before the Coronavirus lockdown kicked off in Australia, I bought my first ever 7-string - a Schecter C-7 Apocalypse. It’s a great guitar, check out the photos! I also wrote about how I ended up with this guitar below the photos. Â When I started my search I wasn’t looking for a 7-string, but the more I researched, the more I began to think I’d like the extra range.
